words.source: H8401 n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw'; KJV 'straw', ESV 'straw', NASB 'straw'

prep. l- + 1cp suff.; KJV 'to us', ESV 'to us', NASB 'to us'
H6213 Qal imv. 2mp of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'make', ESV 'make', NASB 'make'
H2009 conj. + interj. הִנֵּה 'behold, look'; KJV 'and behold', ESV 'and behold', NASB 'and behold'
